    glmodel

      Methods in glmodel that return GL_Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.getClone()
      return a copy of this matrix
      GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.inverse()
      return the inverse of this matrix
      static GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.multiply(GL_Matrix m1, GL_Matrix m2)
      Multiply the two matrices.
      static GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.rotateMatrix(float dx, float dy, float dz)
      create a rotation matrix
      static GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.scaleMatrix(float d)
      create a Matrix to scale all axes equally
      static GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.scaleMatrix(float dx, float dy, float dz)
      create a Matrix to change scale
      static GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.translateMatrix(float dx, float dy, float dz)
      create a Matrix shifted by the given amounts
      Methods in glmodel with parameters of type GL_Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GL_Matrix GL_Matrix.multiply(GL_Matrix m1, GL_Matrix m2)
      Multiply the two matrices.
      void GL_Matrix.preTransform(GL_Matrix n)
      transforms this matrix by matrix n from right (this=this x n)
      void GL_Matrix.transform(GL_Matrix n)
      transforms this matrix by matrix n from left (this=n x this)
